INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Moderate increase of the digoxinemia due to increase of its absorption by the omeprazole
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Clinical monitoring, EKG, and monitoring of the digoxinemia, particularly with an older patient.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the blood concentrations of the tacrolimus
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Blood concentration dosage of the tacrolimus, testing of the renal function and adjustment of the dosage during the administration of the substances together and after it is stopped.
